artist: Engraver: A.B. Duhamel; Artist: after Claude-Louis Desrais; Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: François Buisson
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: Woman in white gown with purple overgown, in blue cape trimmed in brown fur, with brown fur muff, and white ruffled hat with purple bows; this individual plate is a duplicate of P.15,154, which is stored with fashion periodical P.15,154.1
portfolio: From Magasin des Modes nouvelles, françaises et anglaises, Paris, 1786-89
title: Plate III from Magasin des Modes Nouvelles, Seconde Année, Troisième Cahier, 10 Décembre 1786
